verses.roman:
śivānanda kahe,--'kene karaha phutkāra?'
teṅha kahe,--"dekha tomāra prabhura vyavahāra

synonyms: śivānanda kahe—Śivānanda Sena said; kene karaha phut-kāra—why are you expressing dismay; teṅha kahe—he replied; dekha—see; tomāra prabhura—of your Lord; vyayahāra—the behavior.
translation: Śivānanda said to Nṛsiṁhānanda, "Why are you expressing dismay?" Nṛsiṁhānanda replied, "Just see the behavior of your Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
